featured.text: Meanwhile, fans across the U.S. are flocking to sports shows to have their heroes sign anything from a bat to a box of cereal.
And then we began getting a lot of questions: What did Mom put in the cereal?
What does Zeke Emanuel have in mind when saying “What did Mom put in the cereal?” (A)

definition.zh_def: 穀物，通常指用於早餐的穀類食品，通常與牛奶一起食用。
definition.en_def: A common breakfast food made from processed grains, often eaten with milk.
definition.example: I like to eat cereal with fresh fruit for breakfast.
